[[Version 5.0]]

[[Version 4.8]]
* Reduced "Lower Difficulty" requirement from World Level 5 to 3.

----
[[Version 1.4]]
* Added "Lower Difficulty" function to decrease your World Level by 1 after reaching World Level 5 in [[Paimon Menu]].
* Added [[Adventure EXP]] conversion to [[Mora]] at a 1:10 ratio after reaching Adventure Rank 60.
----
[[Version 1.0]]
* Adventure Rank was released.
